original_text: When Moses went into the tent, the pillar of cloud would come down. The cloud would stay at the door of the tent while the Lord spoke to Moses.
korean_text: 모세가 회막에 들어갈 때에 구름 기둥이 내려 회막 문에 서며 여호와께서 모세와 말씀하시니

sentences.original_text: When Moses went into the tent
the pillar of cloud would come down
The cloud would stay at the door of the tent
while the Lord spoke to Moses
